video_prompt: Sky colors intensely shift from deep blue to glowing orange/yellow, radiating across the frame. Palm tree silhouettes subtly sway. Waves gently break, foam expanding and receding, reflecting the dynamic sky. Water shimmers with changing light.
image_prompt: **Vertical shot of a vibrant beach at sunrise/sunset with an explosion of warm colors. Dusky blue and purple sky transitions to intense orange and yellow glow, reflected on wet sand. Silhouetted palm trees on the left, gentle waves on the right. Tranquil and beautiful, focusing on dramatic sky reflections.**
refined_video_prompt: Sky colors intensely shift from deep blue to glowing orange/yellow, radiating across the frame. Palm tree silhouettes subtly sway. Waves continuously break, their foam expanding, receding, and dynamically reflecting the evolving sky. Water shimmers with fluctuating light.
